name: Multiplatform WLAN Enumeration and Geolocation
author: Tom Sellers <tom@fadedcode.net>
description:
Enumerate wireless networks visible to the target device.
        Optionally geolocate the target by gathering local wireless networks and
        performing a lookup against Google APIs.
platform: Android, OSX, Windows, Linux, BSD, Solaris

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: GEOLOCATE
options.description: Use Google APIs to geolocate Linux, Windows, and OS X targets.

options.name: APIKEY
options.description: Key for Google APIs if error is received without one.
